poem:
Title: Shto wn an Ayledun Masscaraed

Upo'n y llys of America thy stand,
The baennered eikon, a falculine godhead in fall.
Ah, gold, tha debased currency of scandal,
For a siren's silence, creu-ly bought.
34 chargges of deceit, a heavy load:
In the machine's cold eye, all man's folly encoded.
Whence springs the justice, frumo whence the resurrection?
In eternal testament of sin's reflection.
